{{title|并发扩展}}
{{cpp/experimental/concurrency/navbar}}

C++ 并发扩展 (C++ Extensions for Concurrency)，ISO/IEC TS 19571:2016，为 C++ 标准库定义下列新组件：

===std::future 的继续及其他扩展===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/future }}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc future}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc shared_future}}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/concurrency/promise |使用 {{lc|std::experimental::future}} 的 {{lc|std::promise}} 修改版本| notes={{mark since concurrency ts}}}}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/concurrency/packaged_task |使用 {{lc|std::experimental::future}} 的 {{lc|std::packaged_task}} 修改版本| notes={{mark since concurrency ts}}}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc when_all}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc when_any}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc make_ready_future}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc make_exceptional_future}}
{{dsc end}}

===特性测试宏===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/future }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_future_continuations | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持 future::then 和其他扩展}}
{{dsc header | experimental/latch }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_latch | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持 latch 类型}}
{{dsc header | experimental/barrier }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_barrier | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持 barrier 类型}}
{{dsc header | experimental/atomic }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_atomic_smart_pointers | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持原子智能指针}}
{{dsc end}}

==并入 C++20==
并发 TS 的下列组件已并入 C++20 标准。

===闩和屏障===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/latch }}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc latch}}
{{dsc header | experimental/barrier }}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc barrier}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc flex_barrier}}
{{dsc end}}

===原子智能指针===
这些类模板替换 shared_ptr 的[[cpp/memory/shared_ptr/atomic|原子函数重载]]
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/atomic }}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc atomic_shared_ptr}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc atomic_weak_ptr}}
{{dsc end}}
